post.body: That is the way to do it...lose the inhibitions...life, not just sex...I am trying out this self confidence thing lately too.
Just turn down the lights & pretend you are a porn star! Fake it till ya make it!
I have not been on much lately...been preoccupied
hey hunny!
Hmmm....I just read back. I may not want to know...you may not want to share....issues?
2 weeks off? Very nice! You deserve it!
I think about that one when I am having a bad day...very good timing, friend!
@camirose that is true
Bahaha! I will take it with me, too!
That effing bitch! You are doing exactly what you should be. That is for the morbidly obese...
@lindajones2520 A girl's gotta do what a girl's gotta do... =)
Well if he's not giving it to ya, have some fun alone time! Still need your own muscles, even if his muscle is missing!
how's you?!
Right on, sista!
better climax...
Very wintery!
good tip! I am always up for enhancing sexual organs...
Um....not exactly...downward dog is kinda sexy fun, though!
Thanks for stopping by!
hey girl!
I was trying to get you to laugh so hard you'd wet YOUR pants!
why? you have asthma or something?
Yeah...that cough + wetting myself= sexaaaaaay
aww....mine is really deep & loud....scary cough...I may need to see a doctor
Well don't go away mad, babe...
Well that shower together earlier probably wasn't a good idea, then...
I will send you good healing vibes. I've got them coming from @pieshopgirl I think....It's been a long twitterday...
I am like a rat in a cage....pressing the lever....
nice. Enjoy!
but there is no sassy0001....hahaha
Sometimes when I drunk mobile twitter, I type @sassy0001....repeatedly.....
I know who's who....although I cannot guarantee I will not mis-type, but that goes for everyone!
but then I would get confused...
They say that, but I am waiting for more research to be conducted.....
OMG Have you heard Weird Al White & Nerdy? If not, go to Youtube right now! Hahahaha!
Haha....I believe that...it probably stimulates all kinds of "feel good" things in the brain, which is good for the body!
Precisely. I do believe he made a difference to some voters out there...especially young ones who are confused.
Doin' alright....I am sick so I used that as an excuse to twitter all day....
hello!
I am heavily medicated...it is kinda nice...but I'd rather not be sick....
